stories.title: From Homemaker to Entrepreneur
stories.author: Lakshmi, Tribal Artisan
stories.content: Before joining Apricity's training program, I had never imagined I could earn my own income. Today, I run a small business making eco-friendly toys and bags. I employ 5 other women from my village. My children now go to a good school, and I've been able to renovate our home. The confidence I've gained is even more valuable than the money.

stories.title: Reviving Our Heritage
stories.author: Kamala, Master Weaver
stories.content: Our traditional weaving patterns were dying. Only a few elderly women knew the techniques, and young people weren't interested. Apricity helped us see the value in our heritage. They connected us with urban markets where people appreciate handmade products. Now, young women are eager to learn, and our craft will live on.

stories.title: A Village Transformed
stories.author: Ravi, Village Leader
stories.content: When Apricity first came to our village, we were skeptical. We had seen many organizations come and go. But they were different - they listened to us, involved us in planning, and stayed committed. Today, our women are earning, our children are studying, and we have basic healthcare. The entire atmosphere of our village has changed.

stories.title: Education Changes Everything
stories.author: Priya, Student
stories.content: My mother joined Apricity's program when I was 10. Before that, we struggled to afford school supplies. Now, not only can she pay for my education, but she's also saving for my college. She tells me I can become anything I want - a doctor, a teacher, or even run my own business like her. That hope means everything.

milestones.achievement: Apricity Life Foundation established with a vision to empower tribal communities
First 100 women complete skill training program; 3 villages adopted
Heritage craft center inaugurated; Partnership with state government begins
Reached 1000+ direct beneficiaries; Launched sustainable textiles initiative
Expanded to 20 villages; First tribal fashion line launched nationally

testimonials.quote: Apricity doesn't just give us fish; they teach us how to fish and help us find the pond.
testimonials.author: Meera, Beneficiary

testimonials.quote: The dignity of earning our own income has transformed not just our bank accounts but our entire community's mindset.
testimonials.author: Sunita, Artisan Group Leader

testimonials.quote: My daughter now dreams of becoming a doctor. That wasn't even imaginable before.
testimonials.author: Rajesh, Parent

partners.name: National Bank for Agriculture and Rural Development
